h1_title: How to Find the Five Skandhas and Unlock a Secret Boss
h2_title: Where to use the Four Skandhas
content: Fly using the clouds and go from the edge of the cliff, almost directly north of where you came. This will be where you can find the Son of Stones optional boss, with the Son sitting at the edge of the cliff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Find_the_Five_Skandhas_and_Unlock_a_Secret_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Find the Five Skandhas and Unlock a Secret Boss', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use the Four Skandhas'.
The content is as follows:
Fly using the clouds and go from the edge of the cliff, almost directly north of where you came. This will be where you can find the Son of Stones optional boss, with the Son sitting at the edge of the cliff.
